mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yishengqingjia_name as yishengqingjiaName ,a.yishengqingjia_text as yishengqingjiaText ,a.qingjia_types as qingjiaTypes ,a.yishengqingjia_time as yishengqingjiaTime ,a.yishengqingjia_number as yishengqingjiaNumber ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yishengqingjia_yesno_types as yishengqingjiaYesnoTypes ,a.yishengqingjia_yesno_text as yishengqingjiaYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number as yishengUuidNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto
FROM yishengqingjia a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yishengqingjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengqingjiaName},'%')
and a.yishengqingjia_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengqingjiaText},'%')
and a.qingjia_types = #{params.qingjiaTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yishengqingjia_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengqingjiaTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.yishengqingjia_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yishengqingjiaTimeEnd})
and a.yishengqingjia_number >= #{params.yishengqingjiaNumberStart}
and a.yishengqingjia_number <= #{params.yishengqingjiaNumberEnd}
and a.yishengqingjia_number = #{params.yishengqingjiaNumber}
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and a.yishengqingjia_yesno_types = #{params.yishengqingjiaYesnoTypes}
and a.yishengqingjia_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengqingjiaYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengUuidNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
